titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to reduce the period during which a court has exclusive authority to administer the oath of allegiance to an applicant for naturalization from 45 days to 5 days.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 4/8/1997--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to reduce from 45 days to 5 days the period during which a court has exclusive authority to administer the naturalization oath of allegiance.
